Luigi's Pizzeria, can I take your order?
Yes, I'd like a large Hawaiian pizza, please.
Okay, one large Hawaiian. Anything else?
Okay, did you want a pan crust or thin crust?
Okay, and could I have your address, please?
Yes, how soon will the pizza get here?
We'll have it at your door very soon.
Please make it in 30 minutes or less.
